titles.title: College Tax Cut Extension Act of 2012
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the American Opportunity Tax Credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/1/2012--Introduced. College Tax Cut Extension Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2016 the American Opportunity Tax Credit (the increased tax credit for educational expenses).
